casebody.data:
Anna Izabela PALOSZ, CoAdministrator (Estate of Bartlomiej F. Palosz), et al.
v.
TOWN OF GREENWICH et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 17, 2018

The petition by the defendant Board of Education of the Town of Greenwich for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 184 Conn.App. 201 (AC 40315), is denied.

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
